titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on monocarboxylic fatty acids derived from palm oil.
A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on monocarboxylic fatty acids derived from palm oil.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Extends and modifies the temporary reduction of duty on monocarboxylic fatty acids derived from palm oil.
